Quote.Author: Herman Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe in traditional marriage and I believe in the Defense of Marriage Act

Quote.Author: Herman Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: People who oppose Obama are said to be racists - so I guess I'm a racist

Quote.Author: Herman Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: I do not believe abortion should be legal

Quote.Author: Herman Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: I didn't know I was a conservative when it didn't matter to me growing up

Quote.Author: Herman Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: One right decision doth not a great president make

Quote.Author: Herman Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: This economy is on life support

Quote.Author: Herman Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: That's the biggest problem, is the tax code itself

Quote.Author: Herman Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: Uncertainty is killing this economy

Quote.Author: Herman Cain
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not someone's fault if they succeeded, it is someone's fault if they failed

Quote.Author: Herman Melville
Quote.QuoteValue: I am, as I am; whether hideous, or handsome, depends upon who is made judge

Quote.Author: Herman Melville
Quote.QuoteValue: It is better to fail in originality than to succeed in imitation

Quote.Author: Herman Melville
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot live only for ourselves. A thousand fibers connect us with our fellow men

Quote.Author: Herman Melville
Quote.QuoteValue: Friendship at first sight, like love at first sight, is said to be the only truth

Quote.Author: Herman Melville
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not down in any map; true places never are

Quote.Author: Herman Melville
Quote.QuoteValue: Art is the objectification of feeling

Quote.Author: Herman Melville
Quote.QuoteValue: A smile is the chosen vehicle of all ambiguities

Quote.Author: Herman Melville
Quote.QuoteValue: At sea a fellow comes out. Salt water is like wine, in that respect

Quote.Author: Herman Melville
Quote.QuoteValue: Know, thou, that the lines that live are turned out of a furrowed brow

Quote.Author: Herman Melville
Quote.QuoteValue: There are some enterprises in which a careful disorderliness is the true method

Quote.Author: Hermann Hesse
Quote.QuoteValue: Some of us think holding on makes us strong; but sometimes it is letting go

Quote.Author: Hermann Hesse
Quote.QuoteValue: Solitude is independence

Quote.Author: Hermann Hesse
Quote.QuoteValue: As a body everyone is single, as a soul never

Quote.Author: Hermann Hesse
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything becomes a little different as soon as it is spoken out loud

Quote.Author: Hermann Hesse
Quote.QuoteValue: People with courage and character always seem sinister to the rest

Quote.Author: Hermann Hesse
Quote.QuoteValue: Happiness is a how; not a what. A talent, not an object

Quote.Author: Hermann Hesse
Quote.QuoteValue: It is possible for one never to transgress a single law and still be a bastard

Quote.Author: Hermann Hesse
Quote.QuoteValue: When dealing with the insane, the best method is to pretend to be sane

Quote.Author: Hermann Hesse
Quote.QuoteValue: If a man has nothing to eat, fasting is the most intelligent thing he can do

Quote.Author: Hermann Hesse
Quote.QuoteValue: Meaning and reality were not hidden somewhere behind things, they were in them, in all of them

Quote.Author: Herodotus
Quote.QuoteValue: Of all possessions a friend is the most precious

Quote.Author: Herodotus
Quote.QuoteValue: I am bound to tell what I am told, but not in every case to believe it

Quote.Author: Herodotus
Quote.QuoteValue: The ears of men are lesser agents of belief than their eyes

Quote.Author: Herodotus
Quote.QuoteValue: Great deeds are usually wrought at great risks

Quote.Author: Herodotus
Quote.QuoteValue: Circumstances rule men; men do not rule circumstances

Quote.Author: Herodotus
Quote.QuoteValue: Men trust their ears less than their eyes

Quote.Author: Herodotus
Quote.QuoteValue: In peace, sons bury their fathers. In war, fathers bury their sons

Quote.Author: Herodotus
Quote.QuoteValue: Knowledge may give weight, but accomplishments give lustre, and many more people see than weigh

Quote.Author: Herodotus
Quote.QuoteValue: The most hateful human misfortune is for a wise man to have no influence

Quote.Author: Herodotus
Quote.QuoteValue: Of all men's miseries the bitterest is this: to know so much and to have control over nothing

Quote.Author: Hesiod
Quote.QuoteValue: For a man wins nothing better than a good wife, and then again nothing deadlier than a bad one

Quote.Author: Hesiod
Quote.QuoteValue: It will not always be summer; build barns

Quote.Author: Hesiod
Quote.QuoteValue: It is not possible either to trick or escape the mind of Zeus

Quote.Author: Hesiod
Quote.QuoteValue: Work is no disgrace: it is idleness which is a disgrace

Quote.Author: Hesiod
Quote.QuoteValue: A day is sometimes our mother, sometimes our stepmother

Quote.Author: Hesiod
Quote.QuoteValue: Do not let a flattering woman coax and wheedle you and deceive you; she is after your barn

Quote.Author: Hesiod
Quote.QuoteValue: Whoever has trusted a woman has trusted deceivers

Quote.Author: Hesiod
Quote.QuoteValue: Happy is the man whom the Muses love: sweet speech flows from his mouth

Quote.Author: Hesiod
Quote.QuoteValue: Preserve the mean; the opportune moment is best in all things

Quote.Author: Hesiod
Quote.QuoteValue: Wealth should not be seized, but the god-given is much better

Quote.Author: Hideo Kojima
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to show people how there are variations and different interpretations of good and evil

Quote.Author: Hideo Kojima
Quote.QuoteValue: As a creator, I always want to betray fans' expectations

Quote.Author: Hideo Kojima
Quote.QuoteValue: My games are rather stressful games, where you have to play for a long time

Quote.Author: Hideo Kojima
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always had a fascination about what's inside a human being

Quote.Author: Hideo Kojima
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't really want to be a celebrity

Quote.Author: Hideo Kojima
Quote.QuoteValue: My goal is to make a player think, 'I want to reenter this world of lies tomorrow.'

Quote.Author: Hideo Kojima
Quote.QuoteValue: What I'm really trying to do is create unique characters

Quote.Author: Hideo Kojima
Quote.QuoteValue: I always say, 'This will be my last 'Metal Gear.'

Quote.Author: Hideo Kojima
Quote.QuoteValue: My biggest failure is 'Metal Gear.' It's my biggest failure and my biggest success

Quote.Author: Hideo Kojima
Quote.QuoteValue: People nowadays don't know about the Cold War and the U.S.'s old rivalry with the U.S.S.R

Quote.Author: Hilary Duff
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people assume I'm perfect. I'm not. I make mistakes. I do things I regret. I'm stubborn

Quote.Author: Hilary Duff
Quote.QuoteValue: I think ambition can be having something that you're good at and love to do

Quote.Author: Hilary Duff
Quote.QuoteValue: People talk worse about people than they talk good about people, because a lot of people like drama

Quote.Author: Hilary Duff
Quote.QuoteValue: My life is very crazy and busy, but I love it that way

Quote.Author: Hilary Duff
Quote.QuoteValue: Mom always tells me to celebrate everyone's uniqueness. I like the way that sounds

Quote.Author: Hilary Duff
Quote.QuoteValue: No, I'm not! I'm not a tomboy! I love my makeup! That's not true! I'm not a tomboy!

Quote.Author: Hilary Duff
Quote.QuoteValue: You don't need to push your beliefs onto other people!

Quote.Author: Hilary Duff
Quote.QuoteValue: Sometimes I just wish I had a day off. I really need to clean my room

Quote.Author: Hilary Duff
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm drawing the gossip surrounding the celebrity, or the image the celebrity tries to push on us

Quote.Author: Hilary Duff
Quote.QuoteValue: My mom always says, 'If you don't believe in something, you'll lose yourself completely.'

Quote.Author: Hilary Mantel
Quote.QuoteValue: Hindsight is the historian's necessary vice

Quote.Author: Hilary Mantel
Quote.QuoteValue: History is always changing behind us, and the past changes a little every time we retell it

Quote.Author: Hilary Mantel
Quote.QuoteValue: I am very happy in second-hand bookshops; would a gardener not be happy in a garden?

Quote.Author: Hilary Mantel
Quote.QuoteValue: Like many people, I am addicted to the physical act of reading

Quote.Author: Hilary Mantel
Quote.QuoteValue: Novels teach you that actions have consequences. They help you grow up

Quote.Author: Hilary Mantel
Quote.QuoteValue: A novel should be a book of questions, not a book of answers

Quote.Author: Hilary Mantel
Quote.QuoteValue: When you write, you are not either sex. But when you're read you are definitely gendered

Quote.Author: Hilary Mantel
Quote.QuoteValue: My first two novels were very black comedies

Quote.Author: Hilary Mantel
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got so many ideas, and sometimes the more exhausted my body gets, the more active my mind gets

Quote.Author: Hilary Mantel
Quote.QuoteValue: Memory isn't a theme; it's part of the human condition

Quote.Author: Hilary Swank
Quote.QuoteValue: You only have one life and if you're not doing what you love, what's the point?

Quote.Author: Hilary Swank
Quote.QuoteValue: I think that we're all continually searching for who we are, and that's ever-evolving and changing

Quote.Author: Hilary Swank
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, working out is literally like eating a meal or drinking water or breathing

Quote.Author: Hilary Swank
Quote.QuoteValue: 'Oh, the Places You'll Go!,' by Dr. Seuss, is still one of my favorite books ever

Quote.Author: Hilary Swank
Quote.QuoteValue: Few people know this about me, but I love baking pies

Quote.Author: Hilary Swank
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to play women who blaze trails

Quote.Author: Hilary Swank
Quote.QuoteValue: Learning how to fly, for me, was so euphoric

Quote.Author: Hilary Swank
Quote.QuoteValue: One thing I've learned: You never know where life is taking you, but it's taking you

Quote.Author: Hilary Swank
Quote.QuoteValue: I had to fight my whole life to break out of my circumstances. That's just part of my makeup

Quote.Author: Hilary Swank
Quote.QuoteValue: My relaxation has always been my animals - going to the dog park with them, going to the beach

Quote.Author: Hill Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: Screening for colon cancer can stop cancer in its tracks

Quote.Author: Hill Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: Credit card interest payments are the dumbest money of all

Quote.Author: Hill Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: Many of us are in are in our own prisons that aren't made of iron bars

Quote.Author: Hill Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: You deserve a great life. I want to see you become unreasonably happy. And you can. And you will

Quote.Author: Hill Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: We are human beings. We operate from wanting to be rewarded

Quote.Author: Hill Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: I think the number one safe haven where people put their money is to invest in yourself first

Quote.Author: Hill Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that reality TV should be called 'not reality' TV; it's fiction

Quote.Author: Hill Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: If you can't get excited about living life, then what are you doing?

Quote.Author: Hill Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: All work and no play make any forensic pathologist a dull boy

Quote.Author: Hill Harper
Quote.QuoteValue: I love being athletic and doing things that are active, even when I'm traveling

Quote.Author: Hippocrates
Quote.QuoteValue: Let food be thy medicine and medicine be thy food

Quote.Author: Hippocrates
Quote.QuoteValue: Walking is man's best medicine

Quote.Author: Hippocrates
Quote.QuoteValue: Wherever the art of medicine is loved, there is also a love of humanity

Quote.Author: Hippocrates
Quote.QuoteValue: Healing is a matter of time, but it is sometimes also a matter of opportunity

Quote.Author: Hippocrates
Quote.QuoteValue: Natural forces within us are the true healers of disease

Quote.Author: Hippocrates
Quote.QuoteValue: Cure sometimes, treat often, comfort always

Quote.Author: Hippocrates
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything in excess is opposed to nature

Quote.Author: Hippocrates
Quote.QuoteValue: Make a habit of two things: to help; or at least to do no harm

Quote.Author: Hippocrates
Quote.QuoteValue: Prayer indeed is good, but while calling on the gods a man should himself lend a hand

Quote.Author: Hippocrates
Quote.QuoteValue: It's far more important to know what person the disease has than what disease the person has

Quote.Author: Holly Near
Quote.QuoteValue: Why do we kill people who are killing people to show that killing people is wrong?

Quote.Author: Holly Near
Quote.QuoteValue: The war on drugs is a war against the communities

Quote.Author: Holly Near
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not allowing my perspective to be dictated by the dominant culture

Quote.Author: Holly Near
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents encouraged thought. You'll get through life better if you learn how to think

Quote.Author: Holly Near
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't just leave out one part; the bread won't rise if the yeast isn't there

Quote.Author: Holly Near
Quote.QuoteValue: When we make mistakes, say, I'm blessed that I have an opportunity to learn from this

Quote.Author: Holly Near
Quote.QuoteValue: People love to hear the mistakes you've made

Quote.Author: Holly Near
Quote.QuoteValue: You just keep feeding hogwash to people, and pretty soon they'll eat it

Quote.Author: Holly Near
Quote.QuoteValue: It is essential that men start being interested in and excited by how women think

Quote.Author: Holly Near
Quote.QuoteValue: Language is like songs, like food, like dance-it is the expression of what we think

Quote.Author: Homaro Cantu
Quote.QuoteValue: I love a great conspiracy story. Who doesn't?

Quote.Author: Homaro Cantu
Quote.QuoteValue: Nobody likes it when someone calls in sick

Quote.Author: Homaro Cantu
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a firm believer that if you can explain it to a kid, you're on the right track

Quote.Author: Homaro Cantu
Quote.QuoteValue: A food's value is based on how good it tastes

Quote.Author: Homaro Cantu
Quote.QuoteValue: If you could eat portions of pine trees, you could eliminate corn in many ways

Quote.Author: Homaro Cantu
Quote.QuoteValue: Algae is the perfect food plant. It doubles cell mass every twelve hours, depending on the strain

Quote.Author: Homaro Cantu
Quote.QuoteValue: The Japanese have a long lifespan in part because they eat different forms of algae

Quote.Author: Homaro Cantu
Quote.QuoteValue: The world is full of challenges, but with those come opportunity, and I'm an opportunist

Quote.Author: Homaro Cantu
Quote.QuoteValue: We can create any sort of flavor on a printed image that we set our minds to

Quote.Author: Homaro Cantu
Quote.QuoteValue: Gastronomy has to catch up to the evolution in technology

Quote.Author: Homer
Quote.QuoteValue: A sympathetic friend can be quite as dear as a brother

Quote.Author: Homer
Quote.QuoteValue: True friends appear less moved than counterfeit

Quote.Author: Homer
Quote.QuoteValue: Hateful to me as the gates of Hades is that man who hides one thing in his heart and speaks another

Quote.Author: Homer
Quote.QuoteValue: Words empty as the wind are best left unsaid

Quote.Author: Homer
Quote.QuoteValue: Wise to resolve, and patient to perform

Quote.Author: Homer
Quote.QuoteValue: The charity that is a trifle to us can be precious to others

Quote.Author: Homer
Quote.QuoteValue: And what he greatly thought, he nobly dared

Quote.Author: Homer
Quote.QuoteValue: The difficulty is not so great to die for a friend, as to find a friend worth dying for

Quote.Author: Homer
Quote.QuoteValue: Two friends, two bodies with one soul inspired

Quote.Author: Homer
Quote.QuoteValue: Light is the task where many share the toil

Quote.Author: Honore de Balzac
Quote.QuoteValue: The heart of a mother is a deep abyss at the bottom of which you will always find forgiveness

Quote.Author: Honore de Balzac
Quote.QuoteValue: Clouds symbolize the veils that shroud God

Quote.Author: Honore de Balzac
Quote.QuoteValue: One should believe in marriage as in the immortality of the soul

Quote.Author: Honore de Balzac
Quote.QuoteValue: A woman knows the face of the man she loves as a sailor knows the open sea

Quote.Author: Honore de Balzac
Quote.QuoteValue: Society bristles with enigmas which look hard to solve. It is a perfect maze of intrigue

Quote.Author: Honore de Balzac
Quote.QuoteValue: No man should marry until he has studied anatomy and dissected at least one woman

Quote.Author: Honore de Balzac
Quote.QuoteValue: In diving to the bottom of pleasure we bring up more gravel than pearls

Quote.Author: Honore de Balzac
Quote.QuoteValue: Laws are spider webs through which the big flies pass and the little ones get caught

Quote.Author: Honore de Balzac
Quote.QuoteValue: The more one judges, the less one loves

Quote.Author: Honore de Balzac
Quote.QuoteValue: A good husband is never the first to go to sleep at night or the last to awake in the morning

Quote.Author: Hope Solo
Quote.QuoteValue: My confidence comes from the daily grind - training my butt off day in and day out

Quote.Author: Hope Solo
Quote.QuoteValue: I just want to stay in my hotel room, read my book. I enjoy that private time

Quote.Author: Hope Solo
Quote.QuoteValue: I couldn't have been a great goalkeeper without power, agility and quickness

Quote.Author: Hope Solo
Quote.QuoteValue: Every athlete acquires routines as a way to help control nerves

Quote.Author: Hope Solo
Quote.QuoteValue: Unfortunately, people think I'm negative and bitter all the time, and that's not the case

Quote.Author: Hope Solo
Quote.QuoteValue: In truth, 2007 was the hardest year of my life. I lost my best friend. I lost my father

Quote.Author: Hope Solo
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't need a captain's band to lead a team to victory

Quote.Author: Hope Solo
Quote.QuoteValue: My life is a beautiful struggle

Quote.Author: Hope Solo
Quote.QuoteValue: Of course Seattle loves soccer. You can see from the men's Seattle Sounders team

Quote.Author: Hope Solo
Quote.QuoteValue: On a global stage, I have respect in the goalkeeping world

Quote.Author: Horace
Quote.QuoteValue: A picture is a poem without words

Quote.Author: Horace
Quote.QuoteValue: Mix a little foolishness with your serious plans. It is lovely to be silly at the right moment

Quote.Author: Horace
Quote.QuoteValue: The pen is the tongue of the mind

Quote.Author: Horace
Quote.QuoteValue: Nothing's beautiful from every point of view

Quote.Author: Horace
Quote.QuoteValue: Fidelity is the sister of justice

Quote.Author: Horace
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't think, just do

Quote.Author: Horace
Quote.QuoteValue: Pale Death beats equally at the poor man's gate and at the palaces of kings

Quote.Author: Horace
Quote.QuoteValue: Cease to inquire what the future has in store, and take as a gift whatever the day brings forth

Quote.Author: Horace
Quote.QuoteValue: Life grants nothing to us mortals without hard work

Quote.Author: Horace
Quote.QuoteValue: Pale death, with impartial step, knocks at the hut of the poor and the towers of kings

Quote.Author: Horace Greeley
Quote.QuoteValue: The illusion that times that were are better than those that are, has probably pervaded all ages

Quote.Author: Horace Greeley
Quote.QuoteValue: Journalism will kill you, but it will keep you alive while you're at it

Quote.Author: Horace Greeley
Quote.QuoteValue: Fame is a vapor; popularity an accident; riches take wings; the only earthly certainty is oblivion

Quote.Author: Horace Greeley
Quote.QuoteValue: I am the inferior of any man whose rights I trample underfoot

Quote.Author: Horace Greeley
Quote.QuoteValue: The darkest hour in any man's life is when he sits down to plan how to get money without earning it

Quote.Author: Horace Greeley
Quote.QuoteValue: Always rise from the table with an appetite, and you will never sit down without one

Quote.Author: Horace Greeley
Quote.QuoteValue: Apathy is a sort of living oblivion

Quote.Author: Horace Greeley
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no bigotry like that of 'free thought' run to seed

Quote.Author: Horace Greeley
Quote.QuoteValue: Common sense is very uncommon

Quote.Author: Horace Greeley
Quote.QuoteValue: Go west, young man

Quote.Author: Horace Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: Seek not greatness, but seek truth and you will find both

Quote.Author: Horace Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: Education is our only political safety. Outside of this ark all is deluge

Quote.Author: Horace Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: Be ashamed to die until you have won some victory for humanity

Quote.Author: Horace Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: It is well to think well; it is divine to act well

Quote.Author: Horace Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: Evil and good are God's right hand and left

Quote.Author: Horace Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: Doing nothing for others is the undoing of ourselves

Quote.Author: Horace Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: To pity distress is but human; to relieve it is Godlike

Quote.Author: Horace Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: Manners easily and rapidly mature into morals

Quote.Author: Horace Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: A human being is not attaining his full heights until he is educated

Quote.Author: Horace Mann
Quote.QuoteValue: If any man seeks for greatness, let him forget greatness and ask for truth, and he will find both

Quote.Author: Horace Walpole
Quote.QuoteValue: This world is a comedy to those that think, a tragedy to those that feel

Quote.Author: Horace Walpole
Quote.QuoteValue: The whole secret of life is to be interested in one thing profoundly and in a thousand things well

Quote.Author: Horace Walpole
Quote.QuoteValue: Nine-tenths of the people were created so you would want to be with the other tenth

Quote.Author: Horace Walpole
Quote.QuoteValue: Men are sent into the world with bills of credit, and seldom draw to their full extent

Quote.Author: Horace Walpole
Quote.QuoteValue: The wisest prophets make sure of the event first

Quote.Author: Horace Walpole
Quote.QuoteValue: In all science, error precedes the truth, and it is better it should go first than last

Quote.Author: Horace Walpole
Quote.QuoteValue: It was easier to conquer it than to know what to do with it

Quote.Author: Horace Walpole
Quote.QuoteValue: By deafness one gains in one respect more than one loses; one misses more nonsense than sense

Quote.Author: Horace Walpole
Quote.QuoteValue: We often repent of our first thoughts, and scarce ever of our second

Quote.Author: Horace Walpole
Quote.QuoteValue: Oh that I were seated as high as my ambition, I'd place my naked foot on the necks of monarchs

Quote.Author: Horatio Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Treat every Frenchman as if he was the devil himself

Quote.Author: Horatio Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Gentlemen, when the enemy is committed to a mistake we must not interrupt him too soon

Quote.Author: Horatio Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: No captain can do very wrong if he places his ship alongside that of the enemy

Quote.Author: Horatio Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Time is everything; five minutes make the difference between victory and defeat

Quote.Author: Horatio Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: England expects that every man will do his duty

Quote.Author: Horatio Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: Desperate affairs require desperate measures

Quote.Author: Horatio Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: First gain the victory and then make the best use of it you can

Quote.Author: Horatio Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: I cannot command winds and weather

Quote.Author: Horatio Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: I could not tread these perilous paths in safety, if I did not keep a saving sense of humor

Quote.Author: Horatio Nelson
Quote.QuoteValue: I have only one eye, I have a right to be blind sometimes... I really do not see the signal!

Quote.Author: Howard Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just deeply disappointed that once again we may have to settle for the lesser of two evils

Quote.Author: Howard Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: John Ashcroft is not a patriot, John Ashcroft is a descendant of Joseph McCarthy

Quote.Author: Howard Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: I've waffled before. I'll waffle again

Quote.Author: Howard Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: Every day it becomes clearer that this was the wrong war at the wrong time

Quote.Author: Howard Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: We won't always have the strongest military

Quote.Author: Howard Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: This is a struggle of good and evil. And we're the good

Quote.Author: Howard Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't care what you label me as long as you call me president

Quote.Author: Howard Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: Real Democrats don't make promises they can't keep

Quote.Author: Howard Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: The fact is that we wouldn't be in Iraq if it weren't for Democrats like Senator Kerry

Quote.Author: Howard Dean
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been endorsed by the National Rifle Association

Quote.Author: Howard Jacobson
Quote.QuoteValue: We shouldn't be too hard on vanity. It can be a mark of respect for the world

Quote.Author: Howard Jacobson
Quote.QuoteValue: Sentimentality works by our seeing only what we want to see

Quote.Author: Howard Jacobson
Quote.QuoteValue: Nostalgic myself, I am a sucker for other men's nostalgia

Quote.Author: Howard Jacobson
Quote.QuoteValue: Not every anti-Semite is Joseph Goebbels. You can not like Jews much and be no great harm to them

Quote.Author: Howard Jacobson
Quote.QuoteValue: A writer should never allow himself to be lulled out of the vigilance native to his profession

Quote.Author: Howard Jacobson
Quote.QuoteValue: Does anyone who leaves a Baltic country ever want to return to it? Someone must, I suppose

Quote.Author: Howard Jacobson
Quote.QuoteValue: The more educated we are, the less we are prepared to tolerate views contrary to our own

Quote.Author: Howard Jacobson
Quote.QuoteValue: There's a problem with narratives. Most that spring to mind are fictional

Quote.Author: Howard Jacobson
Quote.QuoteValue: Artless fairy stories enchant us in our first years and retain their hold on us until our last

Quote.Author: Howard Jacobson
Quote.QuoteValue: For my own poor part, I go to great lengths to keep my nostrils sightly

Quote.Author: Howard Rheingold
Quote.QuoteValue: Any virtual community that works, works because people put in some time

Quote.Author: Howard Rheingold
Quote.QuoteValue: By the time you get a job, you know how to behave in a meeting or how to write a simple memo

Quote.Author: Howard Rheingold
Quote.QuoteValue: Advertising in the past has been predicated on a mass market and a captive audience

Quote.Author: Howard Rheingold
Quote.QuoteValue: You can't pick up the telephone and say, 'Connect me with someone else who has a kid with leukemia.'

Quote.Author: Howard Rheingold
Quote.QuoteValue: Its not a global village, but we're in a highly interconnected globe

Quote.Author: Howard Rheingold
Quote.QuoteValue: Openness and participation are antidotes to surveillance and control

Quote.Author: Howard Rheingold
Quote.QuoteValue: Some digital natives are extraordinarily savvy

Quote.Author: Howard Rheingold
Quote.QuoteValue: We like technology because we don't have to talk to anybody

Quote.Author: Howard Rheingold
Quote.QuoteValue: Craigslist is about authenticity. Craig has paid his dues, and people respect him

Quote.Author: Howard Rheingold
Quote.QuoteValue: People move from place to place and job to job, but they no longer need to lose touch

Quote.Author: Howard Schultz
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't imagine a day without coffee. I can't imagine!

Quote.Author: Howard Schultz
Quote.QuoteValue: Starbucks represents something beyond a cup of coffee

Quote.Author: Howard Schultz
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to reinvent food at Starbucks. Less could be more

Quote.Author: Howard Schultz
Quote.QuoteValue: Cutting prices or putting things on sale is not sustainable business strategy

Quote.Author: Howard Schultz
Quote.QuoteValue: I think if you're an entrepreneur, you've got to dream big and then dream bigger

Quote.Author: Howard Schultz
Quote.QuoteValue: We think of Starbucks not as a coffee company but a media company

Quote.Author: Howard Schultz
Quote.QuoteValue: Starbucks has changed the rules of engagement for the music industry

Quote.Author: Howard Schultz
Quote.QuoteValue: Do I take criticism of Starbucks personally? Of course I do

Quote.Author: Howard Schultz
Quote.QuoteValue: Starbucks is in my blood. It is such a part of me that letting it unravel simply was not an option

Quote.Author: Howard Schultz
Quote.QuoteValue: At an early age, my mother gave me this feeling that anything is possible, and I believe that

Quote.Author: Howard Stern
Quote.QuoteValue: It's no treat being in bed with me
